reviewText:
Would someone PLEASE help me to copy this movie IN ENGLISH and good quality to my PC or DVD? I will pay by credit card (or cash if you're in DFW) double or triple the price here. I have a VHS copy purchased from here but who the hell watches VHS anymore and will it copy to DVD in decent quality? SOMEONE must surely have a DVD copy!
m t n t e x a s (no spaces) at gee mail dot com
